title: Unable to log into account
body:
I think this may be only due to the pbe thing
But yea I downloaded the pbe and have tried logging in to no success. Says that my username/password is wrong, despite it not being wrong. There is also a little download going on in the login client, which says it has an estimation of 3000+ minutes to download.

replies.body:
If you're not able to login to your PBE account even now, I'd recommend reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist you in recovering the account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
